column2: Ahhh, the Sunken Temple, huh? Boy, wouldn’t it be something if it were real? Don’t know who’d actually want to live there, though.
I wonder what I should make for dinner tonight. Guess I’ll just have to go out there and see what I can catch!
Seeing all these machines fall out of the sky is like...something out of a dream. If only it hadn’t turned out to be a nightmare...
I can’t wait to see what I end up catching for dinner tonight!
